td.content: s:pt presents w/ c/o 7 days h/o severe increased thirst, severe b/l foot pain, moderate lethargy and Diabetes. he is a white M aged 33 yrs. denies any alcohol use he smokes 1 pack a day o:Height 192 cm, Weight 66.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16, Basic Metabolic Panel BUN=30 mg/dL,creatinine=2 mg/dL, Arterial Blood Gas 6.0,HCO3=17 meq/L, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:administered insulin aspart - 100 mg/mL subcutaneous daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Arterial Blood Gas, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:34 year old white male porter with C/O moderate lethargy for 7 weeks that is frequent. pt also reports severe increased thirst, severe b/l foot pain. denies any alcohol use he has been a chronic smoker for the last 3 years o:Height 191 cm, Weight 66.1 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Basic Metabolic Panel BUN=30 mg/dL,creatinine=2 mg/dL, Arterial Blood Gas 6.0,HCO3=17 meq/L, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:administered insulin aspart - 100 mg/mL subcutaneous daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Arterial Blood Gas, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
